speaker: AEMELIA
line: And thereof came it that the man was mad.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: The venom clamours of a jealous woman

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Poisons more deadly than a mad dog's tooth.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: It seems his sleeps were hinder'd by thy railing,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: And therefore comes it that his head is light.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Thou say'st his meat was sauced with thy upbraidings:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Unquiet meals make ill digestions;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Thereof the raging fire of fever bred;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: And what's a fever but a fit of madness?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Thou say'st his sports were hinderd by thy brawls:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Sweet recreation barr'd, what doth ensue

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: But moody and dull melancholy,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Kinsman to grim and comfortless despair,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: And at her heels a huge infectious troop

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Of pale distemperatures and foes to life?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: In food, in sport and life-preserving rest

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: To be disturb'd, would mad or man or beast:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: The consequence is then thy jealous fits

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Have scared thy husband from the use of wits.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: LUCIANA
line: She never reprehended him but mildly,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: LUCIANA
line: When he demean'd himself rough, rude and wildly.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: LUCIANA
line: Why bear you these rebukes and answer not?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: She did betray me to my own reproof.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Good people enter and lay hold on him.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: No, not a creature enters in my house.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Then let your servants bring my husband forth.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Neither: he took this place for sanctuary,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: And it shall privilege him from your hands

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Till I have brought him to his wits again,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Or lose my labour in assaying it.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: I will attend my husband, be his nurse,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Diet his sickness, for it is my office,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: And will have no attorney but myself;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: And therefore let me have him home with me.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Be patient; for I will not let him stir

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Till I have used the approved means I have,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: With wholesome syrups, drugs and holy prayers,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: To make of him a formal man again:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: It is a branch and parcel of mine oath,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: A charitable duty of my order.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Therefore depart and leave him here with me.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: I will not hence and leave my husband here:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: And ill it doth beseem your holiness

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: To separate the husband and the wife.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Be quiet and depart: thou shalt not have him.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: LUCIANA
line: Complain unto the duke of this indignity.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Come, go: I will fall prostrate at his feet

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: And never rise until my tears and prayers

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Have won his grace to come in person hither

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: And take perforce my husband from the abbess.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Second Merchant
line: By this, I think, the dial points at five:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Second Merchant
line: Anon, I'm sure, the duke himself in person

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Second Merchant
line: Comes this way to the melancholy vale,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Second Merchant
line: The place of death and sorry execution,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Second Merchant
line: Behind the ditches of the abbey here.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Upon what cause?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Second Merchant
line: To see a reverend Syracusian merchant,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Second Merchant
line: Who put unluckily into this bay

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Second Merchant
line: Against the laws and statutes of this town,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Second Merchant
line: Beheaded publicly for his offence.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANGELO
line: See where they come: we will behold his death.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: LUCIANA
line: Kneel to the duke before he pass the abbey.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: Yet once again proclaim it publicly,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: If any friend will pay the sum for him,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: He shall not die; so much we tender him.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Justice, most sacred duke, against the abbess!

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: She is a virtuous and a reverend lady:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: It cannot be that she hath done thee wrong.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: May it please your grace, Antipholus, my husband,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Whom I made lord of me and all I had,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: At your important letters,--this ill day

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: A most outrageous fit of madness took him;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: That desperately he hurried through the street,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: With him his bondman, all as mad as he--

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Doing displeasure to the citizens

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: By rushing in their houses, bearing thence

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Rings, jewels, any thing his rage did like.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Once did I get him bound and sent him home,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Whilst to take order for the wrongs I went,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: That here and there his fury had committed.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Anon, I wot not by what strong escape,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: He broke from those that had the guard of him;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: And with his mad attendant and himself,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Each one with ireful passion, with drawn swords,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Met us again and madly bent on us,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Chased us away; till, raising of more aid,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: We came again to bind them. Then they fled

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Into this abbey, whither we pursued them:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: And here the abbess shuts the gates on us

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: And will not suffer us to fetch him out,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Nor send him forth that we may bear him hence.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Therefore, most gracious duke, with thy command

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Let him be brought forth and borne hence for help.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: Long since thy husband served me in my wars,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: And I to thee engaged a prince's word,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: When thou didst make him master of thy bed,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: To do him all the grace and good I could.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: Go, some of you, knock at the abbey-gate

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: And bid the lady abbess come to me.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: I will determine this before I stir.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Servant
line: O mistress, mistress, shift and save yourself!

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Servant
line: My master and his man are both broke loose,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Servant
line: Beaten the maids a-row and bound the doctor

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Servant
line: Whose beard they have singed off with brands of fire;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Servant
line: And ever, as it blazed, they threw on him

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Servant
line: Great pails of puddled mire to quench the hair:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Servant
line: My master preaches patience to him and the while

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Servant
line: His man with scissors nicks him like a fool,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Servant
line: And sure, unless you send some present help,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Servant
line: Between them they will kill the conjurer.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Peace, fool! thy master and his man are here,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: And that is false thou dost report to us.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Servant
line: Mistress, upon my life, I tell you true;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Servant
line: I have not breathed almost since I did see it.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Servant
line: He cries for you, and vows, if he can take you,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Servant
line: To scorch your face and to disfigure you.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Servant
line: Hark, hark! I hear him, mistress. fly, be gone!

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: Come, stand by me; fear nothing. Guard with halberds!

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Ay me, it is my husband! Witness you,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: That he is borne about invisible:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Even now we housed him in the abbey here;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: And now he's there, past thought of human reason.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Justice, most gracious duke, O, grant me justice!

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Even for the service that long since I did thee,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: When I bestrid thee in the wars and took

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Deep scars to save thy life; even for the blood

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: That then I lost for thee, now grant me justice.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: Unless the fear of death doth make me dote,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: I see my son Antipholus and Dromio.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Justice, sweet prince, against that woman there!

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: She whom thou gavest to me to be my wife,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: That hath abused and dishonour'd me

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Even in the strength and height of injury!

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Beyond imagination is the wrong

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: That she this day hath shameless thrown on me.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: Discover how, and thou shalt find me just.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: This day, great duke, she shut the doors upon me,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: While she with harlots feasted in my house.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: A grievous fault! Say, woman, didst thou so?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: No, my good lord: myself, he and my sister

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: To-day did dine together. So befall my soul

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: As this is false he burdens me withal!

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: LUCIANA
line: Ne'er may I look on day, nor sleep on night,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: LUCIANA
line: But she tells to your highness simple truth!

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANGELO
line: O perjured woman! They are both forsworn:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANGELO
line: In this the madman justly chargeth them.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: My liege, I am advised what I say,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Neither disturbed with the effect of wine,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Nor heady-rash, provoked with raging ire,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Albeit my wrongs might make one wiser mad.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: This woman lock'd me out this day from dinner:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: That goldsmith there, were he not pack'd with her,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Could witness it, for he was with me then;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Who parted with me to go fetch a chain,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Promising to bring it to the Porpentine,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Where Balthazar and I did dine together.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Our dinner done, and he not coming thither,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: I went to seek him: in the street I met him

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: And in his company that gentleman.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: There did this perjured goldsmith swear me down

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: That I this day of him received the chain,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Which, God he knows, I saw not: for the which

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: He did arrest me with an officer.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: I did obey, and sent my peasant home

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: For certain ducats: he with none return'd

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Then fairly I bespoke the officer

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: To go in person with me to my house.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: By the way we met

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: My wife, her sister, and a rabble more

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Of vile confederates. Along with them

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: They brought one Pinch, a hungry lean-faced villain,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: A mere anatomy, a mountebank,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: A threadbare juggler and a fortune-teller,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: A needy, hollow-eyed, sharp-looking wretch,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: A dead-looking man: this pernicious slave,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Forsooth, took on him as a conjurer,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: And, gazing in mine eyes, feeling my pulse,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: And with no face, as 'twere, outfacing me,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Cries out, I was possess'd. Then all together

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: They fell upon me, bound me, bore me thence

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: And in a dark and dankish vault at home

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: There left me and my man, both bound together;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Till, gnawing with my teeth my bonds in sunder,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: I gain'd my freedom, and immediately

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Ran hither to your grace; whom I beseech

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: To give me ample satisfaction

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: For these deep shames and great indignities.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANGELO
line: My lord, in truth, thus far I witness with him,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANGELO
line: That he dined not at home, but was lock'd out.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: But had he such a chain of thee or no?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANGELO
line: He had, my lord: and when he ran in here,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANGELO
line: These people saw the chain about his neck.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Second Merchant
line: Besides, I will be sworn these ears of mine

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Second Merchant
line: Heard you confess you had the chain of him

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Second Merchant
line: After you first forswore it on the mart:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Second Merchant
line: And thereupon I drew my sword on you;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Second Merchant
line: And then you fled into this abbey here,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Second Merchant
line: From whence, I think, you are come by miracle.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: I never came within these abbey-walls,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Nor ever didst thou draw thy sword on me:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: I never saw the chain, so help me Heaven!

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: And this is false you burden me withal.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: Why, what an intricate impeach is this!

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: I think you all have drunk of Circe's cup.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: If here you housed him, here he would have been;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: If he were mad, he would not plead so coldly:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: You say he dined at home; the goldsmith here

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: Denies that saying. Sirrah, what say you?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: Sir, he dined with her there, at the Porpentine.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Courtezan
line: He did, and from my finger snatch'd that ring.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: 'Tis true, my liege; this ring I had of her.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: Saw'st thou him enter at the abbey here?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Courtezan
line: As sure, my liege, as I do see your grace.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: Why, this is strange. Go call the abbess hither.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: I think you are all mated or stark mad.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: Most mighty duke, vouchsafe me speak a word:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: Haply I see a friend will save my life

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: And pay the sum that may deliver me.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: Speak freely, Syracusian, what thou wilt.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: Is not your name, sir, call'd Antipholus?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: And is not that your bondman, Dromio?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: Within this hour I was his bondman sir,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: But he, I thank him, gnaw'd in two my cords:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: Now am I Dromio and his man unbound.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: I am sure you both of you remember me.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: Ourselves we do remember, sir, by you;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: For lately we were bound, as you are now

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: You are not Pinch's patient, are you, sir?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: Why look you strange on me? you know me well.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: O, grief hath changed me since you saw me last,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: And careful hours with time's deformed hand

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: Have written strange defeatures in my face:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: But tell me yet, dost thou not know my voice?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Neither.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: Dromio, nor thou?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: No, trust me, sir, nor I.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: I am sure thou dost.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: Ay, sir, but I am sure I do not; and whatsoever a

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: man denies, you are now bound to believe him.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: Not know my voice! O time's extremity,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: Hast thou so crack'd and splitted my poor tongue

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: In seven short years, that here my only son

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: Knows not my feeble key of untuned cares?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: Though now this grained face of mine be hid

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: In sap-consuming winter's drizzled snow,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: And all the conduits of my blood froze up,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: Yet hath my night of life some memory,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: My wasting lamps some fading glimmer left,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: My dull deaf ears a little use to hear:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: All these old witnesses--I cannot err--

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: Tell me thou art my son Antipholus.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: I never saw my father in my life.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: But seven years since, in Syracusa, boy,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: Thou know'st we parted: but perhaps, my son,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: Thou shamest to acknowledge me in misery.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: The duke and all that know me in the city

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Can witness with me that it is not so

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: I ne'er saw Syracusa in my life.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: I tell thee, Syracusian, twenty years

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: Have I been patron to Antipholus,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: During which time he ne'er saw Syracusa:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: I see thy age and dangers make thee dote.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Most mighty duke, behold a man much wrong'd.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: I see two husbands, or mine eyes deceive me.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: One of these men is Genius to the other;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: And so of these. Which is the natural man,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: And which the spirit? who deciphers them?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF SYRACUSE
line: I, sir, am Dromio; command him away.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: I, sir, am Dromio; pray, let me stay.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: AEgeon art thou not? or else his ghost?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF SYRACUSE
line: O, my old master! who hath bound him here?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Whoever bound him, I will loose his bonds

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: And gain a husband by his liberty.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Speak, old AEgeon, if thou be'st the man

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: That hadst a wife once call'd AEmilia

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: That bore thee at a burden two fair sons:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: O, if thou be'st the same AEgeon, speak,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: And speak unto the same AEmilia!

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: If I dream not, thou art AEmilia:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: If thou art she, tell me where is that son

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEGEON
line: That floated with thee on the fatal raft?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: By men of Epidamnum he and I

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: And the twin Dromio all were taken up;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: But by and by rude fishermen of Corinth

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: By force took Dromio and my son from them

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: And me they left with those of Epidamnum.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: What then became of them I cannot tell

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: I to this fortune that you see me in.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: Why, here begins his morning story right;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: These two Antipholuses, these two so like,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: And these two Dromios, one in semblance,--

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: Besides her urging of her wreck at sea,--

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: These are the parents to these children,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: Which accidentally are met together.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: Antipholus, thou camest from Corinth first?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: No, sir, not I; I came from Syracuse.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: Stay, stand apart; I know not which is which.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: I came from Corinth, my most gracious lord,--

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: And I with him.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Brought to this town by that most famous warrior,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Duke Menaphon, your most renowned uncle.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: Which of you two did dine with me to-day?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: I, gentle mistress.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: And are not you my husband?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: No; I say nay to that.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: And so do I; yet did she call me so:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: And this fair gentlewoman, her sister here,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: Did call me brother.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: What I told you then,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: I hope I shall have leisure to make good;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: If this be not a dream I see and hear.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANGELO
line: That is the chain, sir, which you had of me.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: I think it be, sir; I deny it not.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: And you, sir, for this chain arrested me.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANGELO
line: I think I did, sir; I deny it not.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: I sent you money, sir, to be your bail,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ADRIANA
line: By Dromio; but I think he brought it not.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: No, none by me.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: This purse of ducats I received from you,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: And Dromio, my man, did bring them me.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: I see we still did meet each other's man,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: And I was ta'en for him, and he for me,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: And thereupon these errors are arose.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: These ducats pawn I for my father here.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: It shall not need; thy father hath his life.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: Courtezan
line: Sir, I must have that diamond from you.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: There, take it; and much thanks for my good cheer.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Renowned duke, vouchsafe to take the pains

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: To go with us into the abbey here

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: And hear at large discoursed all our fortunes:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: And all that are assembled in this place,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: That by this sympathized one day's error

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Have suffer'd wrong, go keep us company,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: And we shall make full satisfaction.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Thirty-three years have I but gone in travail

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Of you, my sons; and till this present hour

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: My heavy burden ne'er delivered.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: The duke, my husband and my children both,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: And you the calendars of their nativity,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: Go to a gossips' feast and go with me;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: AEMELIA
line: After so long grief, such festivity!

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DUKE SOLINUS
line: With all my heart, I'll gossip at this feast.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF SYRACUSE
line: Master, shall I fetch your stuff from shipboard?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF EPHESUS
line: Dromio, what stuff of mine hast thou embark'd?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF SYRACUSE
line: Your goods that lay at host, sir, in the Centaur.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: He speaks to me. I am your master, Dromio:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: Come, go with us; we'll look to that anon:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: ANTIPHOLUS OF SYRACUSE
line: Embrace thy brother there; rejoice with him.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF SYRACUSE
line: There is a fat friend at your master's house,

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF SYRACUSE
line: That kitchen'd me for you to-day at dinner:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF SYRACUSE
line: She now shall be my sister, not my wife.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: Methinks you are my glass, and not my brother:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: I see by you I am a sweet-faced youth.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: Will you walk in to see their gossiping?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF SYRACUSE
line: Not I, sir; you are my elder.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: That's a question: how shall we try it?

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF SYRACUSE
line: We'll draw cuts for the senior: till then lead thou first.

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: Nay, then, thus:

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: We came into the world like brother and brother;

scene: SCENE I.  A street before a Priory.
speaker: DROMIO OF EPHESUS
line: And now let's go hand in hand, not one before another.
